page.title: 02LITTLEHAMPTON_INTRODUCTION
page.content: Littlehampton is a small seaside town on the south coast of England with a pop. of 23000. It is situated on the banks of the River Arun, south of the south downs. Littlehampton has golden beaches where you can swim in the blue sea and sun bathe to your hearts content. There are many other attractions in this seaside town which boasts a swimming centre, with a pool,squash courts and a fitness suite. There is also a boating lake,minature railway,amusement centre, golf course and many other amenities on offer. Littlehampton is a growing industral town with many new industral estates.
